channel.title: World Cup on BalleWale Cricket News
channel.description: Recent content in World Cup on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: Ellis Backs Australia's Pace Depth to Cover Big-Name Absences Ahead of World Cup
item.description: Australia's pace bowling depth is set to shine as Ellis emphasizes readiness to fill gaps left by injured stars in the World Cup.

item.title: England Survive Nepal Scare to Clinch Last-Ball Thriller
item.description: In a nail-biting encounter, England edged past Nepal in a thrilling last-ball finish, showcasing resilience and skill in the World Cup.

item.title: Ireland Opt for Extra Batter as They Ask Sri Lanka to Bat First
item.description: Ireland's strategic decision to include an extra batter pays off as they face Sri Lanka in their latest ODI clash.

item.title: Ireland Opt for Extra Batter as They Ask Sri Lanka to Bat First in World Cup Clash
item.description: Ireland's strategic decision to include an extra batter against Sri Lanka in the World Cup highlights their approach to the match.

item.title: BCB President, PCB, ICC in Lahore for Talks Over India Match Boycott
item.description: BCB President, PCB officials, and ICC representatives meet in Lahore to discuss the ongoing India match boycott ahead of the World Cup.

item.title: BCB President, PCB, ICC Meet in Lahore to Discuss India Match Boycott
item.description: BCB, PCB, and ICC officials convene in Lahore to address the ongoing India match boycott issue ahead of the upcoming World Cup.

item.title: 'Not 100% sure what to expect' - South Africa face Canada's unknowns in World Cup clash
item.description: South Africa prepares to face Canada in the World Cup, highlighting the unpredictability of their opponents and the importance of adaptability.

item.title: 'Not 100% sure what to expect' - South Africa face Canada's unpredictable challenge
item.description: South Africa prepares for an uncertain encounter against Canada in the World Cup, highlighting the challenges of facing an unknown opponent.

item.title: 'Not 100% sure what to expect' - South Africa face challenge against Canada's unknowns
item.description: South Africa prepares to face Canada in a crucial encounter, navigating the uncertainties posed by the emerging team.

item.title: England Bat First; Nepal Hands Debut to Sher Malla in World Cup Clash
item.description: In a thrilling World Cup encounter, England set the stage while Nepal introduces Sher Malla, marking a significant moment for the team.

item.title: Seifert and Phillips Conquer Afghanistan Spin to Script Convincing New Zealand Win
item.description: New Zealand's Seifert and Phillips excel against Afghanistan's spin attack, leading their team to a decisive victory in the World Cup clash.

item.title: Afghanistan Pack Their XI with Spinners, Ask New Zealand to Field
item.description: Afghanistan opts for a spin-heavy lineup against New Zealand in their World Cup clash, emphasizing their strategic approach in the tournament.

item.title: Afghanistan Opt for Spin-heavy Line-up Against New Zealand in World Cup Clash
item.description: Afghanistan's strategic decision to field a spin-dominant XI against New Zealand highlights their tactical approach in the World Cup.

item.title: Washington Sundar to Join Indian Squad Ahead of Namibia Clash
item.description: Washington Sundar is set to join the Indian cricket team in Delhi ahead of their upcoming match against Namibia.

item.title: Out-of-sorts Sri Lanka present Ireland opportunity for an upset
item.description: Sri Lanka's struggles in the World Cup create a chance for Ireland to secure a significant upset in their upcoming clash.

item.title: USA Bowl, India Opt for Siraj as Bumrah Misses Out Due to Illness
item.description: India's bowling lineup sees a change as Jasprit Bumrah is sidelined with illness, paving the way for Mohammed Siraj in the latest match against the USA.

item.title: Injury-hit New Zealand Eye Revenge as Afghanistan Look to Run It Back
item.description: New Zealand faces Afghanistan in a crucial World Cup clash, seeking redemption after previous encounters amidst injury challenges.

item.title: Scotland Opt to Field First Against West Indies in World Cup Clash
item.description: Scotland chooses to bowl first against West Indies in their World Cup match, aiming for an early breakthrough.
